previous.excerpt: PictureThis® identifies 1,000,000+ plants every day with 98% accuracy-better than most human experts. Get your gardening questions answered and become a “green thumb”! Simply take a photo of the plant and PictureThis answers all the questions for you!
previous.title: PictureThis 2.0 - Instantly identify plants like a botanist in your pocket 🌱

localize.description: PictureThis®每天识别1,000,000多种植物，准确率高达98%，比大多数人类专家都要好。让你的园艺问题得到解答，成为一名“园艺高手”！只需给植物拍张照片，就能为你解答所有问题！
localize.tagline: 立即识别您口袋中的植物，就像植物学家一样🌱

localize.description: PictureThis®每天識別1,000,000多種植物，準確率高達98%，比大多數人類專家都要好。讓你的園藝問題得到解答，成爲一名“園藝高手”！只需給植物拍張照片，就能爲你解答所有問題！
localize.tagline: 立即識別您口袋中的植物，就像植物學家一樣🌱

next.excerpt: Gumroad University is a curated collection of interviews, challenges, guides, documentation, and workshops, designed to help creators get inspired, create something fantastic, and bring it to market sucessfully.
next.title: Gumroad University - A guided tour of our best resources by creators for creators

localize.description: GumRoad大学是一个精心策划的采访、挑战、指南、文档和研讨会的集合，旨在帮助创作者获得灵感，创造一些奇妙的东西，并成功地将其推向市场。
localize.tagline: 由创作者为创作者导览我们最好的资源

localize.description: GumRoad大學是一個精心策劃的採訪、挑戰、指南、文檔和研討會的集合，旨在幫助創作者獲得靈感，創造一些奇妙的東西，併成功地將其推向市場。
localize.tagline: 由創作者爲創作者導覽我們最好的資源
